P8T

A PICO-8 Twitter Client

Personal Project

A simple Twitter client made with PICO-8. This is a proof-of-concept meant to demonstrate netcode capabilities over GPIO.

  • https://seansleblanc.itch.io/p8t
  • https://github.com/seleb/pico-8-gpio
  • /stuff/P8T
